name: Kalalau Kush
description: Kalalau Kush is a stimulating sativa-dominant hybrid named for the beautiful Kalalau Valley on the garden island of Kaua’i. This flower smells of guava with herbaceous undertones. The flavor is tropical, exhibiting hints of mango and musky spice. Kalalau Kush offers consumers potent cerebral energy and vigorous physical stimulation. It is ideal for outdoor activity and for patients combating depression and lethargy. This strain is produced by Pua Mana 1st Hawaiian Pakalōlō Seed Bank.
descriptionPlain: Kalalau Kush is a stimulating sativa-dominant hybrid named for the beautiful Kalalau Valley on the garden island of Kaua’i. This flower smells of guava with herbaceous undertones. The flavor is tropical, exhibiting hints of mango and musky spice. Kalalau Kush offers consumers potent cerebral energy and vigorous physical stimulation. It is ideal for outdoor activity and for patients combating depression and lethargy. This strain is produced by Pua Mana 1st Hawaiian Pakalōlō Seed Bank.

highlightedReviews.text:
Named after the breathtaking Hawaiian Valley she was born in, Kalalau Kush is the crown jewel of our collection, as she is the cherry on top of the gorgeous Hawaiian island chain.

This strain was created crossing 2 'Ono (delicious) strains (Kaua'i Electric x Trinity Kush) in Kalalau Valley on the island of Kaua'i!

This is no easy task, first the original outlaw breeder had to hike the 11 mile trail along Kaua'i’s world famous Nā Pali coast. Then he had to evade helicopters, rangers, and rippers for months in the jungle to pull off the ultimate Hawaiian Kush strain named after her birth place in Kalalau Valley.

Kalalau Kush is the best kush you will ever taste! Like the clean pristine stream water of Kalalau, she taste of guavas and mangos with a hint of musky tropical spice.
